blogPost.excerpt: Fuel fund showcases selected startups to 1000s of handpicked investors in the US. Think of it as a fund's demo day but asynchronous and massively scalable. When a startup lists on wantfuel.com, we forward their details to almost 5000+ investors on our rolodex.
blogPost.body: Fuel fund showcases selected startups to 1000s of handpicked investors in the US. Think of it as a fund's demo day but asynchronous and massively scalable. When a startup lists on wantfuel.com, we forward their details to almost 5000+ investors on our rolodex.
blogPost.title: Fuel Fund - List your startup and get discovered by 1000s of investors
blogPost.author: Sid

localize.description: 燃料基金向美国数以千计精挑细选的投资者展示精选的初创企业。可以将其视为基金的演示日，但不同步且可大规模扩展。当一家初创公司在wantfuel.com上上市时，我们会将他们的详细信息转发给我们的rolodex上的近5000多名投资者。
localize.tagline: 列出你的创业公司，被成千上万的投资者发现

localize.description: 燃料基金向美國數以千計精挑細選的投資者展示精選的初創企業。可以將其視爲基金的演示日，但不同步且可大規模擴展。當一家初創公司在wantfuel.com上上市時，我們會將他們的詳細信息轉發給我們的rolodex上的近5000多名投資者。
localize.tagline: 列出你的創業公司，被成千上萬的投資者發現

previous.excerpt: Need landing page in Webflow, web-platform in Bubble, mobile app in Adalo or an automation in Zapier? Don't spend time on learning NoCode platforms. With WeLoveNoCode you can send unlimited NoCode projects to a team of Nocode developers for a monthly fee
previous.title: WeLoveNoCode - NoCode development for a monthly fee

next.excerpt: 12 illustrative Christmas icons in 3D. Available in large PNGs or source files in PSD and C4D. Free to be used for commercial or personal purposes. All we ask is to attribute Iconfinder.
next.title: Free Christmas icons in 3D - Make your holiday designs pop with 3D Christmas icons
